bugphyzz 0.0.1.3

    • write_physiology_sets

Fetch physiological data

physiologies.Rd

Fetch physiological data

physiologies(keyword = "all")

Arguments

keyword

a character vector of physiologies desired (see curationLinks). For the available physiologies, run bugphyzz::physiologies_list()

Value

a large list of tidy data.frames

Examples

x <- physiologies()

#> Dropped 15914 rows with missing Attribute_value from animal pathogen
#> Finished antimicrobial resistance
#> Dropped 3054 rows with missing Attribute_value from antimicrobial sensitivity
#> Dropped 3583 rows with missing Attribute_value from biofilm forming
#> Finished butyrate producing
#> Finished acetate producing
#> Finished lactate producing
#> Dropped 6864 rows with missing Attribute_value from arrangement
#> Dropped 9304 rows with missing Attribute_value from shape
#> Finished COGEM pathogenicity rating
#> Finished mutation rate per site per generation
#> Finished mutation rates per site per year
#> Finished extreme environment
#> Dropped 9312 rows with missing Attribute_value from gram stain
#> Finished growth medium
#> Finished growth temperature
#> Finished habitat
#> Finished optimal ph
#> Finished aerophilicity
#> Finished plant pathogenicity
#> Finished width
#> Finished spore shape
#> Finished isolation site
#> Finished disease association
#> Finished hydrogen gas producing
#> Finished length
head(x[[1]])

#>   NCBI_ID Genome_ID Accession_number                         Taxon_name
#> 1  244596        NA               NA              Hoeflea phototrophica
#> 2   53633        NA               NA          Sulfobacillus acidophilus

y <- physiologies(c("gram stain", "aerophilicity"))

#> Dropped 9312 rows with missing Attribute_value from gram stain
#> Finished aerophilicity
head(y[[1]])
